did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: First Presbyterian Church of Livonia registers (transcripts), 1806-1872.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: First Presbyterian Church of Livonia (Livonia, N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Transcripts contain baptismal records, members at time of church organization, members received, and dismissions, suspensions and deaths.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Transcripts contain baptismal records (1807-1824), members at time of church organization (1806), members received (1807-1817), and dismissions, suspensions and deaths (1806-1836, 1872).
